summary: A little joke of a mod that I thought I would share. Pretty FUCKING AWESOME but who cares!
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.2
Done all the iron weapons in the style you wanted, (each part different).

Version 1.1 
Added iron mace, iron dagger, iron war-axe and iron bow.

A little joke of a mod that I thought I would share. Pretty FUCKING AWESOME but who cares!

For the Armour texture: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4208
author: James
